title: Dmail
extract: 1Messages distributed by electronic means from one computer user to one or more recipients via a network. ... 'It's silly that a guy who consumes a terabyte of data a month gets the same service for the same price as someone who just wants to read email and surf the web.'
extract_html: 1Messages distributed by electronic means from one computer user to one or more recipients via a network. ... 'It's silly that a guy who consumes a terabyte of data a month gets the same service for the same price as someone who just wants to read email and surf the web.'
